titleStmt.title: The moste pleasuante arte of the interpretacion of dreames whereunto is annexed sundry problemes with apte aunsweares neare agreeing to the m atter, and very rare examples, not like the extant in the English tongue. Gathered by the former auctour Thomas Hill Londoner: and now newly imp rinted.
titleStmt.author: Hill, Thomas, b. ca. 1528.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestreate neare to S. Dunstones Church by Thomas Marsh,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The distinction of dreames.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
